entry.title: `OP_EVICT`: An Alternative to `OP_TAPLEAFUPDATEVERIFY`
entry.summary: In a recent conversation about the punitive channels and their potential danger, ZmnSCPxj suggested that adding a small penalty fee for cheating attempts could be ideal. However, he also pointed out that nothing in the Decker-Russell-Osunstokun paper prevents the addition of such fees. He further explained that the paper just focuses on the mechanism without taking fees into account. In the end, ZmnSCPxj signed off with his regards.
